body:
Ok... before I talk, I'll give u a little bit of understanding, I was in TS talking to ppl while playing avicus... and  Cyclops and some mod were playing this Japaneese server, while I was playing Avicus I suddenly got bored, and asked them for the IP. Then they told me the IP and I was so curious how the Japaneese server looked like. But when I tried to join...I couldn't, and when I checked the reason................................

http://imgur.com/a/J8OAC

title: MOST RACIST SERVER

replies.body: So, they ban you because you're region locked? Or what? A lot of products do that (region-locked) such as games and that's how imports on some products work. It's a block server with stuff you wouldn't understand anyway, if it concerns you use a VPN.

replies.body:
D.7: Posts that discuss details regarding other Minecraft servers is not allowed. Certain sections of these posts may be obscured if the post exhibits any text that could be considered advertising. This also doesn't really need to be put on the forums.


Locking...
